name: Minehopper
description:
CONTROLS
R - Restart
Mouse - Look
L/R-shift - Jump
WASD/Arrow keys - Move
Right-click - Flag (when landing/walking on a new block)
Right+Left-click - Reveal surrounding blocks

This was a boredom project, done in two days. As such, I don't plan on updating this a whole lot more. If you'd like, feel free to leave suggestions in the comments, and, if there's enough interest, I may continue a bit more work on it!
